title: How do i Disconect from garena
body: my launcher when i load up LoL is a garena launcher i recently downloaded it but how do i get rid of it?

replies.body: Garena is managed by another support and client entirely.  You'll want to uninstall that and download the NA/OCE supported client [here](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).
